Bootstrap confidence interval

Source: R/bootstrap_framework.R
bootstrap_conf_interval.Rd

Calculates bootstrap confidence intervals using the percentile method. This function is a utility that can be used alongside p-value calculations.

Usage

bootstrap_conf_interval(
  data,
  statistic,
  n_bootstraps = 10000,
  conf_level = 0.95,
  progress = TRUE,
  seed = NULL
)

Arguments

data

Numeric vector of observations

statistic

Function that computes the statistic of interest

n_bootstraps

Number of bootstrap samples (default: 10000)

conf_level

Confidence level (default: 0.95)

progress

Logical; show progress bar (default: TRUE)

seed

Random seed for reproducibility (default: NULL)

Value

A list containing:

estimate

Point estimate of the statistic

conf_int

Confidence interval as a numeric vector of length 2

conf_level

The confidence level used

bootstrap_distribution

Vector of bootstrap statistics
